::Ramulus::

Ramulus takes the hand, shaking it. "Ramhorn wouldn't have lived if we opened 
fire, and that would be two Maximals dead, instead of zero. I've never seen 
someone scream at a Predacon with a hostage, though..."

He was still a bit surprised at Spears' action in the hostage situation. To 
him, it was a dumb way of resolving things, but maybe it could'ave worked.
